Svetovna liga, 2. skupina - 1/2 finale 2: Avstralija - Japonska
programme.desc: V drugem polfinalu drugeg skupine svetovne lige v odbojki se bosta pomerili Avstralija in Japonska. Kdo si bo zagotovil svoje mesto v velikem finalu?

programme.title: ATP 500 Queens: 1/2 finale (2x)
programme.desc: Turnir v Queensu so prvič organizirali že leta 1890, do danes pa je postal eden najprestižnejših v travnatem delu sezone. Čeprav je tik pred zdajci svoj nastop odpovedal Rafael Nadal, bo imel Andy Murray vse prej kot lahko delo, če bo želel ubraniti naslov, saj so svoj prihod napovedali še trije člani prve deseterice: Stan Wawrinka, Miloš Raonić in Marin Čilić. Bo Murray znova navdušil navijače v Londonu?

programme.title: Live! Svetovna liga, 2. skupina: Tekma za 3. mesto
Live! Svetovna liga, 2. skupina - Finale: Slovenija - Japonska
programme.desc: Slovenska odbojkarska reprezentanca je na krilih Mitje Gasparinija v polfinalu zaključnega turnirja v Avstraliji odpihnila Nizozemsko, ki ni niti v enem trenutku ogrozila zmago izbrancev Slobodana Kovača. Slovence v finalu čaka Japonska, ki je v drugem polfinalu z zmago proti Avstraliji utišala domače navijače, vendarle pa se zdi, da bo našo reprezentanco težko presenetila(c)

programme.title: 2. Spanish league - Finale: Getafe - Tenerife
programme.desc: Segunda division (od leta 2008 naprej Liga Adelante; v prevodu pomeni »Liga naprej«) je bila ustanovljena leta 1929 in je druga najmočnejša nogometna liga v Španiji. V njej nastopa 22 klubov. Iz Segunde vsako leto trije najboljši klubu napredujejo v Primero Division, štirje najslabši pa izpadejo v Segundo Division B

programme.title: Live! ATP 500 Halle - Finale: Federer - Zverev
programme.desc: Turnir v Halleju je stalnica v travnatem delu teniške sezone in ga številni poznajo pod imenom Gerry Weber, ki daje ime tudi glavnemu stadionu v tem nemškem mestu. V Halleju je svoj povratek v teniške arene napovedal tudi sam Roger Federer, ki bo imel v Dominicu Thiemu, Keiu Nišikoriju, Alexandru Zverevu in ostalih več kot dostojno konkurenco. Bo Švicar še devetič slavil zmago in napovedal pohod na novo zmago v Wimbledonu?(c)

programme.title: Live! ATP 500 Queens - Finale: Čilić - Lopez
programme.desc: Turnir v Queensu so prvič organizirali že leta 1890, do danes pa je postal eden najprestižnejših v travnatem delu sezone. programme.title: Kitajska liga: Tianjin - Guangzhou R&F
programme.desc: V najštevilčnejši državi na planetu iz leta v letu več vlagajo v nogomet. V Kitajski prvi ligi tako najdemo številna ugledna imena, kot so Jackson Martinez, Teixiera, Ramires, Gervinho, Ezequiel Lavezzi in ostali, ki dvigujejo raven kakovosti kitajskega nogometa. V leta 2004 ustanovljeni Super ligi se meri 16 moštev, aktualni prvaki prihajajo iz vrste Guangzhou Evergrande, ki so s šestimi naslovi hkrati tudi najuspešnejše moštvo

programme.title: NBA - Finale (5. tekma): Golden State - Cleveland
programme.desc: Še tretje leto zapored se bosta v finalu lige NBA srečala Golden State Warriors in Cleveland Cavaliers, kar bi težko označili za presenečenje. Na eni strani Steph Curry, na drugi LeBron James. Kdo bo boljši letos? Pred dvema sezonama so bili uspešnejši bojevniki, pred letom dni pa konjeniki. Zagotovo se nam obeta košarkarska poslastica, ki jo ne smete zamuditi

programme.desc: Avstralci se kljub glasni podpori s tribun niso uspeli uvrstiti v finale, saj so bili Japonci boljši po petih nizih, tako da se bodo z Nizozemci, ki niso imeli možnosti proti razpoloženim Slovencem, pomerili za končno tretje mesto. Kdo bo dobil obračun za tolažilno tretje mesto?(c)

programme.title: ATP 500 Queens - Finale: Čilić - Lopez
programme.desc: Turnir v Queensu so prvič organizirali že leta 1890, do danes pa je postal eden najprestižnejših v travnatem delu sezone. Čeprav je tik pred zdajci svoj nastop odpovedal Rafael Nadal, bo imel Andy Murray vse prej kot lahko delo, če bo želel ubraniti naslov, saj so svoj prihod napovedali še trije člani prve deseterice: Stan Wawrinka, Miloš Raonić in Marin Čilić. Bo Murray znova navdušil navijače v Londonu?(c)

programme.title: Live! Prijateljska tekma: Olympiacos - Ludogorets

programme.title: Kitajska liga: Guangzhou Evergrande - Hebei
programme.desc: V najštevilčnejši državi na planetu iz leta v letu več vlagajo v nogomet. V Kitajski prvi ligi tako najdemo številna ugledna imena, kot so Jackson Martinez, Teixiera, Ramires, Gervinho, Ezequiel Lavezzi in ostali, ki dvigujejo raven kakovosti kitajskega nogometa. V leta 2004 ustanovljeni Super ligi se meri 16 moštev, aktualni prvaki prihajajo iz vrste Guangzhou Evergrande, ki so s šestimi naslovi hkrati tudi najuspešnejše moštvo

programme.title: NFL Super Bowl (naj tekme sezone): New England Patriots - Atlanta Falcons
Kitajska liga: Tianjin - Guangzhou R&F
programme.desc: V najštevilčnejši državi na planetu iz leta v letu več vlagajo v nogomet. V Kitajski prvi ligi tako najdemo številna ugledna imena, kot so Jackson Martinez, Teixiera, Ramires, Gervinho, Ezequiel Lavezzi in ostali, ki dvigujejo raven kakovosti kitajskega nogometa. V leta 2004 ustanovljeni Super ligi se meri 16 moštev, aktualni prvaki prihajajo iz vrste Guangzhou Evergrande, ki so s šestimi naslovi hkrati tudi najuspešnejše moštvo

programme.title: Live! WTA Premier Eastbourne
programme.desc: Tretji letošnji turnir za grand slam v Wimbledonu je tik pred vrati. Igralke imajo na voljo le še nekaj dni, da odpravijo zadnje pomanjkljivosti. V Eastbournu bomo videli kar šest igralk iz prve deseterice na čelu z branilko naslova Dominiko Cibulkovo, ki jo čaka vse prej kot lahko delo, če bo želela urabniti zmago

programme.title: Svetovna liga, 2. skupina - 1/2 finale 1: Slovenija - Nizozemska
programme.desc: Slovenski odbojkarji so svoje delo v drugi skupini svetovne lige za zdaj opravili z odliko in se na zaključni turnir v Avstraliji uvrstili z enim samim porazom. V polfinalu zaključnega turnirja jih čakajo Nizozemci, proti katerim odkrito napadajo uvrstitev v veliki finale. Glede na formo izbrancev Slobodana Kovača, uvrstitev v finale ne bi smela biti vprašljiva

programme.title: Svetovna liga, 2. skupina - 1/2 finale 2: Avstralija - Japonska
programme.desc: V drugem polfinalu drugeg skupine svetovne lige v odbojki se bosta pomerili Avstralija in Japonska. Kdo si bo zagotovil svoje mesto v velikem finalu?

programme.title: World Judo Tour: Grand Prix Cancun (3. dan)
programme.desc: World Judo Tour se z naslednjim Grand Prixom nadaljuje v Cancunu. Slovenski tekmovalci bodo imeli tudi v Mehiki visoke cilje. Ali jih bodo uspeli uresničiti, spremljajte na Sportklubu

programme.title: Spanish league - Naj tekme sezone: Real Madrid - Deportivo (3:2)
programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 55 krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke Barcelone

programme.title: Premier league - Naj tekme sezone: Crystal Palace - Arsenal (3:0)
programme.desc: Premier League je profesionalna nogometna liga v Angliji. V njej nastopa 20 klubov, ki se od avgusta do maja borijo za naslov prvaka. Večina tekem je odigranih ob sobotah in nedeljah popoldan, preostalih nekaj krogov pa med tednom zvečer. Premier League je najbolj gledana nogometna liga na svetu. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Leicestra

programme.sub-title: KPMG Women's PGA Championship Special from Olympia Fields Country Club
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal are headed to Olympia Fields Country Club to teach the short game shots the LPGA's best face in the KPMG Women's PGA Championship. There is also a special lesson with five-time major champion Phil Mickelson on what makes him one of the greatest of all-time with a wedge. Numerous LPGA players in the field stop by to share how they prepare for a major venue, and no trip to the Chicago area would be complete without a lesson in dealing with Windy City conditions. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Trained Assassins
programme.desc: The crew highlights the best of 2016 turkey season

programme.title: Out Da' Bayou
programme.desc: Local law enforcement joins the crew for a first-time gator hunt. Watch men who face danger daily turn into children as the adrenaline and teeth get the best of them

programme.title: The Habit
programme.desc: Chuck, JP and Jon head to Florida to bowfish for amberjack and tilapia. Later, they sneak off to chase longbeards

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Part 2. Pigman and Dap are off to Mexico where Dap goes on an impressive javelina spree. Also: an elusive 12-point buck catches Pig's attention

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Near Great Falls, Mont., the mulies run the ridges and the whitetails own the valleys. With an either/or tag, Craig Boddington opts to hunt the brushy draws and hayfields for big whitetail bucks

programme.title: Relentless Pursuit
programme.desc: Tim Hunts hill country whitetail with sticks and string. Also: Tim lights up a giant coyote with tracers

programme.title: Dead Dog Walking
programme.desc: Clay Belding and Alex Crosby head out on one last trip of the season

programme.title: Trailing the Hunter's Moon
programme.desc: Blake and Larry hunt from Africa to Europe as they relive some of their best hunt so far this year

programme.title: Monster Bucks
programme.desc: David Blanton of Whitetail Properties reflects on some of his best hunts ever

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Part 2. Pigman and Dap are off to Mexico where Dap goes on an impressive javelina spree. Also: an elusive 12-point buck catches Pig's attention

programme.title: Rugged Nation
programme.desc: Big game hunting in North America

programme.title: Respect the Game TV
programme.desc: Producer Paul Biggs and The Virtue host, Phillip Vanderpool, hunt the Sooner State for whitetails

programme.title: Relentless Pursuit
programme.desc: Tim Hunts hill country whitetail with sticks and string. Also: Tim lights up a giant coyote with tracers

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: In celebration of 13 years in TV production, Curt Wells takes viewers for a walk down memory lane to re-live some of the staff's big-game encounters

programme.title: Turkey Man
programme.desc: Eddie is joined by his preacher, Casey, to discuss a charity deer hunt that they put on in Texas. Then, Eddie talks about his last turkey hunts of the season in Alabama

programme.title: Avian-X TV
programme.desc: Matt Morrett discovers the secrets behind breaking flocks of fall turkeys with Pete Clair and his dog, Cash, at Turkey Trot Acres. Marlin Watkins breaks down how he put the turkey in the new Wicked Series Box Call from Zink Calls

programme.title: Out Da' Bayou
programme.desc: Local law enforcement joins the crew for a first-time gator hunt. Watch men who face danger daily turn into children as the adrenaline and teeth get the best of them

programme.title: Waterfowl Obsession
programme.desc: Scott Butz chases spring snow geese in Saskatchewan

programme.title: Xtreme Crappie Angler
programme.desc: Fishing with legendary crappie guide John Harrison on Enid Lake, Miss. in November

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: The North American Whitetail team heads for home in pursuit of whitetail bucks on familiar ground; Stan Potts debates archery releases; and Dr. James Kroll and Pat Hogan plant cool-season food plots

programme.title: Sporting Chef
programme.desc: Chef Leysath takes a detour on the way to an African safari to discover how they prepare wild game and fish below the equator. Gemsbuck, kudu, oryx, kingklip and more are on the menu. Also, plenty of South African wine

programme.title: ConQuest 200 *
programme.desc: Doug Roberts begins the process of weaning and tagging fawns. Valor, an abandoned fawn, lives through a horrible sickness and is released back to the herd

programme.title: Full Draw Adventures *
programme.desc: Ralph and son start off the season with action-packed hunts on opposite sides of the U.S. After an up-close thriller with a Kentucky velvet buck, Ralph travels to the backcountry of Wyoming in search of his first elk

programme.title: The Lindsey Way *
programme.desc: David and Jeff head to Utah with Josh Horrocks to chase big velvet mule deer. David strikes first while Jeff tracks the "Pipeline Buck."

programme.title: Dominant Bucks *
programme.desc: Learn the Dominant Buck tactics of buck hunter Chad Rushing. Chad illustrates several unique methods he uses when hunting his home farm in Illinois

programme.title: Red Rising *
programme.desc: Eric Hale is hunting during the opening of archery season in his home state of Virginia. He is after a buck named Mr. Crabtree that has shown up on the Browning Trailcams. Eric searches for the oak tree where Mr. Crabtree feeds on acorns

programme.title: The Hunt *
programme.desc: Jake is in Oregon with John Cole and Hunter's Rendezvous on the trail of a giant mule deer

programme.title: Buckventures' The Woodsman *
programme.desc: Jeff Danker heads to the sandhills of Nebraska to chase giant mule deer

programme.title: McMillan *
programme.desc: Join McMillan Outfitting for the start of a brand-new archery season with guests Brad Schorr and Bill Harris. Gatlin gets ready for trick or treating by showing mom and dad exactly how he wants to look for Halloween

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: The guys pursue muskies. Also: Joey shows Miles around the Spider Chain of Lakes in Hayward, Wisconsin

programme.title: In-Fisherman *
programme.desc: The staff travles to some of the greatest fisheries in North America. They fish the Yukon River for gargantuan pike, fly in to a multispecies in northern Saskatchewan and reveal what it takes to catch two-pound bluegills

programme.title: The Western Hunter *
programme.desc: Part 1. Nate Simmons bowhunts bugling bulls on public-land in the backcountry of Nevada. The elk rut is in full swing as Nate searches for one of the big bulls the area is known for

programme.title: Pure Hunting *
programme.desc: Will Schmidt heads to his property in Nebraska for a last-minute, self-filmed whitetail hunt. The area had been hit hard by EHD in previous years so he's hoping the quality of bucks has improved

programme.title: Fresh Tracks With Randy Newberg *
programme.sub-title: New Mexico, Land of Uncooperative Elk
programme.desc: Randy and World Champion Elk Caller, Corey Jacobsen of ELK101.com, cover mile after dusty mile to find cooperative bulls during this hot full-moon archery elk hunt in the hills western New Mexico

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures *
programme.desc: Donna Boddington attends the Wyoming Women's Antelope Hunt and mentors a young teacher on her first hunt. Both gals hunt hard and take their prairie goats in a walk-up spot-and-stalk hunt

programme.title: Long Range Pursuit
programme.desc: Wyoming mountain-goat action

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Cooking Special: Wild to Table: Meateater Memorable Meals
programme.desc: Steve cooks rainbow trout he caught in southwest Montana

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV *
programme.desc: Starting From Scratch highlights the R&D process for bringing new firearms, ammo and optics/accessories to market. Suppressors 101 covers everything from A-to-Z on this red-hot category

programme.title: GunVenture *
programme.desc: Tom and Ryan head north for some scattergun fun. While one heads to South Dakota for a pheasant hunt, the other heads to Michigan to rouse some grouse. Also: a custom-fitting with Dr. Shotgun for Tom and a fun drive in a 1973 fire truck for Ryan

programme.title: Small Town Hunting *
programme.desc: The rut is whide open in the South, and Kevin Meacham finds himself stuck inside the office at his sales job. While hunting, a pink box stand may raise some questions, but it's probably the best place on the farm

programme.title: Adrenaline *
programme.desc: The adrenaline flows as the crew showcases the giant buck encounters to come after riding the whitetail roller coaster for an entire season

programme.title: Whitetail Slam *
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll heads into the land of Palmetto bucks. Florida's seminole whitetail is a unique deer sub-species that ruts in July

programme.title: Wildlifers *
programme.sub-title: Monster Mule Deer and Bighorn Rams
programme.desc: The Wildlifers are in Colorado trying to get Stephanie a behemoth mule deer, while Dan has a big surprise for his longtime guide Bridger Petrini. Finally, Dan's brother Thomas shows up for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to take a bighorn ram

programme.title: Extreme Outer Limits TV *
programme.desc: Part 1. Bob and Chris Beck fish for northern pike and hunt giant black bears in Alberta

programme.title: Big Boys TV *
programme.desc: Part 1. The Johnson family heads back to Africa for the second time in search of African plains game

programme.title: The Most Wanted List *
programme.desc: In the treacherous mountains of New Zealand and Jessie Jo's red stag already checked off the list, Jess Smith has her sights set on tahr

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion *
programme.desc: Melissa Bachman heads to Alaska with her dad in search of a big black bear with good friend Jason Boyer on Prince of Wales Island

programme.title: Beyond The Divide *
programme.sub-title: Feral Goats and Pigs of the NSW Tablelands
programme.desc: In New South Wales early gold prospectors introduced goats that have now multiplied and become a pest. Late winter is prime time for hunting goats

programme.title: West of Texas *
programme.desc: Hunting in the untouched wilderness of Canada's Northwest Territories, Stephen West and friend Gary Sitton are in a man-against-nature situation. The main focus of this hunt is a Dall sheep for Gary
